@graph.name: 5 Minute Tofu Egg Salad Sandwich Recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This Tofu Egg Salad Sandwich comes together in 5 minutes, uses pantry ingredients, is super easy. Vegan Egg-less Recipe. Quick Breakfast or Lunch

itemListElement.name: 5 Minute Tofu Egg Salad Sandwich Recipe

@graph.name: 5 minute Tofu "Egg" Salad Sandwich
@graph.description: This Tofu Egg Salad Sandwich comes together in 5 minutes, uses pantry ingredients, is super easy. Vegan Egg-less Recipe. Quick Breakfast or Lunch
recipeIngredient: 1/4 to 1/2 tsp Indian Black Salt Kala Namak
1/4 tsp or more chipotle pepper powder  (or other hot chili powder)
1/4 tsp or more freshly ground black pepper
add 1 Tbsp vegan mayo or dijon mustard for variation
add 2 tbsp chopped celery for variation

recipeInstructions.text: Press the Tofu between your hands to remove some not all excess liquid. Crumble the Tofu into a large bowl with your hands
recipeInstructions.name: Press the Tofu between your hands to remove some not all excess liquid. Crumble the Tofu into a large bowl with your hands

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients through cilantro and mix well. Taste and adjust to preference. Chill until ready to serve. Before serving, dress with a very liberal sprinkle of freshly ground pepper! and salt to taste. Tastes best after chilling for some time.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the ingredients through cilantro and mix well. Taste and adjust to preference. Chill until ready to serve. Before serving, dress with a very liberal sprinkle of freshly ground pepper! and salt to taste. Tastes best after chilling for some time.

itemListElement.text: (Toast the slices if you like them toasted). Layer spicy mustard dip or dijon mustard or vegan mayo on the slice. Add greens, a good layer of tofu scramble salad. and serve.
itemListElement.name: (Toast the slices if you like them toasted). Layer spicy mustard dip or dijon mustard or vegan mayo on the slice. Add greens, a good layer of tofu scramble salad. and serve.
